name: Soul ferry
description:
The story of this game is adapted from a chapter of the animation Angel Beats. The mechanics were inspired by code Vein.

In this story, you are a new employee in heaven. There are many wandering souls out there who can't get into heaven because they still have regrets about their lives that have ended. You need to look into their lives and try to soothe their souls so they can enter heaven.

Made by UE4

Most of model and animation is from:  https://www.mixamo.com/#/

music:

My song  -by Marina

The Torn Letter  -by Martijn de Boer (NiGiD)
